thread.section_title: USA Equipment Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of USA Equipment Direct | usaequipmentdirect.com
thread.title: Ron Fox President Fox Winery.
thread.title_full: USA Equipment Direct reviewed by Ron Fox President Fox Winery.

author: Ron Fox President Fox Winery.
title: Ron Fox President Fox Winery.
text: Honestly I have no problems with my purchase with USA Equipment Direct, that being said I would have liked a little better communication about a shipping date. I'm not in a hurry but being the type A personality I am I would like to have had an estimated date. As it turns out my partner tells me my purchase will arrive tomorrow. I did list my mobile number as well as my shop number but only my shop was called so I could not arrange to have someone available for a quicker delivery. Next time and I would not hesitate to shop there as I expand Ill only list my mobile number. But I am 100% satisfied.
